course_description: This course refreshes the students' knowledge of programming for data manipulation and analysis.  built upon a prior knowledge of programming, the course will conduct exercises in R, Python, SQL and other languages.  students will also be using a variety of unix tools, file-transfer methods, etc. Course may also employ cloud-based services such as AWS and/or Azure.
